**[Slides and recording](https://osf.io/47req/)**
**Date: July 12, 2021**\
**SORTEE website: [sortee.org/events](https://www.sortee.org/events/)**  

SORTEE is a service organization which brings together researchers working to improve reliability and transparency through cultural and institutional changes in ecology, evolutionary biology, and related fields broadly defined. Julie Lowndes is presenting a keynote talk on July 12 at the inaugural conference and is proud to be a part of this community.
